<?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF xmlns="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#" xml:base="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca" xmlns:cc="http://creativecommons.org/ns#" xmlns:emotion="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:xml="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" xmlns:voaf="http://purl.org/vocommons/voaf#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:vann="http://purl.org/vocab/vann/" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"> <owl:Ontology rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca"> <voaf:classNumber rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer">16</voaf:classNumber> <dcterms:modified>2013-11-26</dcterms:modified> <dcterms:created>2013-08-30</dcterms:created> <dcterms:contributor> <rdf:Description> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> <foaf:name>Peter Sander</foaf:name> </rdf:Description> </dcterms:contributor> <foaf:homepage rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca"/> <dcterms:contributor> <rdf:Description> <foaf:name>Fabien Gandon</foaf:name> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> </rdf:Description> </dcterms:contributor> <dcterms:contributor> <rdf:Description> <foaf:name>Ghislain Atemezing</foaf:name> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> </rdf:Description> </dcterms:contributor> <vann:preferredNamespacePrefix>emotion</vann:preferredNamespacePrefix> <dcterms:title xml:lang="en">Emotion ontology for context awareness</dcterms:title> <cc:license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/"/> <dcterms:description xml:lang="en">EmOCA is used to contextualize dimensional emotion and to categorize it for human readability</dcterms:description> <dcterms:creator> <rdf:Description> <foaf:name>Franck Berthelon</foaf:name> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> </rdf:Description> </dcterms:creator> <vann:preferredNamespaceUri rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#"/> <cc:license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/"/> <voaf:propertyNumber rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer">9</voaf:propertyNumber> <dcterms:publisher rdf:resource="http://dbpedia.org/resource/INSEE"/> <owl:versionInfo>Version 1.0 - 2013-11-26</owl:versionInfo> </owl:Ontology>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Annotation properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#involves -->
<owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#involves"> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">involves</rdfs:label> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Stimulus"/> </owl:AnnotationProperty>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#relatesTo -->
<owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#relatesTo"> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">relates to</rdfs:label> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Trait"/> </owl:AnnotationProperty>
<!-- http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/name -->
<owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/name"/>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Object Properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasImpact -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasImpact"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Trait"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Impact"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has impact</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasTrait -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasTrait"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Person"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Trait"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has trait</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#isDefinedBy -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#isDefinedBy"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Coordinate"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">is defined by</rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#pertainsTo -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#pertainsTo"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Impact"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Component"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">pertains to </rdfs:label> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Data properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasEffect -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasEffect"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Impact"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#double"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has effect</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasMaximum -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasMaximum"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Coordinate"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#double"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has maximum</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasMinimum -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#hasMinimum"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Coordinate"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#double"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has minimum</rdfs:label> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Classes // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Anger -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Anger"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Anger</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Arousal -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Arousal"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Component"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Arousal</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Component -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Component"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Coordinate"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Component</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Coordinate -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Coordinate"> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Coordinate</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Disgust -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Disgust"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Disgust</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion"> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Emotion</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Fear -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Fear"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Fear</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Impact -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Impact"> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Impact</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Joy -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Joy"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Joy</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Person -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Person"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Person</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Radius -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Radius"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Coordinate"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Radius</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Sadness -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Sadness"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Sadness</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Stimulus -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Stimulus"> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Stimulus</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Surprise -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Surprise"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Emotion"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Surprise</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Trait -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Trait"> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Trait</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Valence -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Valence"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca#Component"/> <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Valence</rdfs:label> </owl:Class>

<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/vocommons/voaf#Vocabulary"/>

<owl:NamedIndividual rdf:about="http://ns.inria.fr/emoca"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://purl.org/vocommons/voaf#Vocabulary"/> </owl:NamedIndividual> <rdf:Description> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> <foaf:name>Franck Berthelon</foaf:name> </rdf:Description> <rdf:Description> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> <foaf:name>Peter Sander</foaf:name> </rdf:Description> <rdf:Description> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> <foaf:name>Ghislain Atemezing</foaf:name> </rdf:Description> <rdf:Description> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> <foaf:name>Fabien Gandon</foaf:name> </rdf:Description> </rdf:RDF>
